TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1086
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to People of the Colony, 05-01-1825

barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1086

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Militia election proclamation [about May 1, 1825?].*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-01-1825">[About May 1, 1825?]*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*The *person_mentioned*militia */person_mentioned*composing the *location_mentioned*upper Company on the Colorado */location_mentioned*are notified to meet at the *location_mentioned*home of *person_mentioned*R. Alley*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Tuscasite */location_mentioned*on *date_mentioned n="05-07-1825">Saturday*/date_mentioned* next for the purpose of electing a *person_mentioned*Captain */person_mentioned*in the place of *person_mentioned*Jesse Burnam*/person_mentioned* whose term of service has expired.*/p*
*p*The term for which the *person_mentioned*officers */person_mentioned*of the *person_mentioned*upper company*/person_mentioned* on the *location_mentioned*Colorado */location_mentioned*were elected having expired the *person_mentioned*militia */person_mentioned*composing said *person_mentioned*company */person_mentioned*are notified to meet at the *location_mentioned*house of *person_mentioned*R Alley*/person_mentioned**/location_mentioned* at *location_mentioned*Tuscsite*/location_mentioned* on *date_mentioned n="05-07-1825">Saturday */date_mentioned*next for the purpose of electing a *person_mentioned*Captain */person_mentioned*one *person_mentioned*Lieut*/person_mentioned*. . . . and two *person_mentioned*Sergeants */person_mentioned*to command said *person_mentioned*Company */person_mentioned*for the ensueing year.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*[Stephen F. Austin.]*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
